TimeDeposits100000OrMore.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.

TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.label: Time Deposits, at or Above FDIC Insurance Limit
TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations that meet or exceed the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit.

TradingActivityGainsAndLossesNet.label: Trading Activity, Gains and Losses, Net (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
TradingActivityGainsAndLossesNet.description: The net gain (loss) on trading activities (including both derivative and nonderivative instruments) recognized in the statement of financial performance.

TradingGainsLosses.label: Trading Gain (Loss)
TradingGainsLosses.description: Amount of gain (loss) resulting from the difference between the acquisition price and the selling price or fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities, conducted separately from customer trading activities. Includes, but is not limited to, changes in fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities.

TradingLiabilities.label: Trading Liabilities
TradingLiabilities.description: The carrying amount of liabilities as of the balance sheet date that pertain to principal and customer trading transactions, or which may be incurred with the objective of generating a profit from short-term fluctuations in price as part of an entity's market-making, hedging and proprietary trading. Examples include short positions in securities, derivatives and commodities, obligations under repurchase agreements, and securities borrowed arrangements.

TradingSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Trading, and Equity Securities, FV-NI
TradingSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

TransferOfOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer from Real Estate Owned
TransferOfOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred out of real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

TransferOtherRealEstate.label: Transfer Other Real Estate (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
TransferOtherRealEstate.description: Value of real estate transferred in noncash transactions during the reporting period.

TransferToOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer to Real Estate Owned
TransferToOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.label: Treasury Stock Acquired, Average Cost Per Share
TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.description: Total cost of shares repurchased divided by the total number of shares repurchased.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

TreasuryStockValueRetiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Retired, Cost Method (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
TreasuryStockValueRetiredCostMethod.description: Value of common and preferred stock retired from treasury during the period. This element is used only when Treasury Stock is accounted for at total cost versus par.

UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.label: Undistributed Earnings of Foreign Subsidiaries
UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.description: Amount of undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiaries intended to be permanently reinvested outside the country of domicile.

UnrealizedGainLossOnCashFlowHedgingInstr.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Cash Flow Hedging Instruments
UnrealizedGainLossOnCashFlowHedgingInstr.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) related to derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments, recorded in results of operations to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be ineffective.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCar.label: Variable Interest Entity, Nonconsolidated, Carrying Amount, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCar.description: Carrying amount of the assets in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the Variable Interest Entity (VIE), where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesRestrictedS.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Restricted Stock
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesRestrictedS.description: Number of shares of restricted stock determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that restricted shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Restricted shares are subject to sales, contractual, regulatory or other restrictions that prevent or inhibit the holder from freely disposing of them before the restriction ends.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityAf.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, after Year 10
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityAf.description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityAf.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, after Year 5 Through 10
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityAf.description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityAf.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, after Year One Through Five
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityAf.description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityWi.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, Year One
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleMaturityWi.description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfte.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, after Year 10
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfte.description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfte.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, after Year 5 Through 10
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfte.description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfte.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, after Year One Through Five
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfte.description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityWith.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, Year One
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityWith.description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringB.label: Subordinated Debt Obligations, Fair Value Disclosure
FairValueLiabilitiesMeasuredOnRecurringB.description: Fair value of subordinated debt obligations including, but not limited to, subordinated loan, subordinated bond, subordinated debenture or junior debt.

CommonStockValueOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Value, Outstanding
CommonStockValueOutstanding.description: Value of all classes of common stock held by shareholders. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized. These shares exclude common shares repurchased by the entity and held as treasury shares.

FinancingReceivableTroubledDebtRestructu.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Increase (Decrease) from Modification
FinancingReceivableTroubledDebtRestructu.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in financing receivable modified from troubled debt restructuring.

GoodwillGross.label: Goodwill, Gross
GoodwillGross.description: Amount before accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillImpairedAccumulatedImpairmentLos.label: Goodwill, Impaired, Accumulated Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairedAccumulatedImpairmentLos.description: Amount of accumulated impairment loss for an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDisp.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Disposition of Business, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDisp.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to disposition of a business not qualifying as a discontinued operation.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Impairment Losses, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to impairment loss.

PaymentsForProceedsFromPreviousAcquisiti.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Previous Acquisition
PaymentsForProceedsFromPreviousAcquisiti.description: The net cash inflow or outflow associated with the aggregate amount of adjustment to the purchase price of a previous acquisition.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Consideration
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of consideration received or receivable for the disposal of assets and liabilities, including discontinued operation.

FinancingReceivableModificationsRecorded.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring
FinancingReceivableModificationsRecorded.description: Amount of financing receivable modified as troubled debt restructuring.

IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueAdjustmentsOn.label: Increase (Decrease) in Fair Value Adjustments on Other Assets (Liabilities) Carried at Fair Value under Fair Value Option
IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueAdjustmentsOn.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value adjustment on other assets (liabilities) carried at fair value under the fair value option on the statement of cash flows of Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Increase for Cost Recognition
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for award under share-based payment arrangement.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUnd.label: Participating Securities, Distributed and Undistributed Earnings (Loss), Basic
ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUnd.description: Amount of earnings (loss) distributed and earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUnd.label: Participating Securities, Distributed and Undistributed Earnings (Loss), Diluted
ParticipatingSecuritiesDistributedAndUnd.description: Amount of earnings (loss) distributed and earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

GoodwillTransfers.label: Goodwill, Transfers
GoodwillTransfers.description: Amount of transfers into (out of) an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

HedgedAssetFairValueHedgeLastOfLayerCumu.label: Hedged Asset, Fair Value Hedge, Last-of-Layer, Cumulative Increase (Decrease)
HedgedAssetFairValueHedgeLastOfLayerCumu.description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged asset in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk, in last-of-layer hedging relationship.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

SecuritiesBorrowedLiability.label: Securities Borrowed, Liability
SecuritiesBorrowedLiability.description: Amount of liability associated with securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral.

SecuritiesLoanedAsset.label: Securities Loaned, Asset
SecuritiesLoanedAsset.description: Amount of asset associated with securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral.

TemporaryEquityOtherChanges.label: Temporary Equity, Other Changes
TemporaryEquityOtherChanges.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in temporary equity from changes classified as other.

BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration, Asset
BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.description: Amount of asset recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination.

BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration, Liability
BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.description: Amount of liability recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination.

DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Amount Offset Against Collateral
DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned offset against a right to receive collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.
